container-title: A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION Published in 2014 by Black Library, Games Workshop Ltd., Willow Road
note: NG7 2WS, UK Cover illustration by Hardy Fowler.
title: NICHOLAS ALEXANDER has written a number of Warhammer 40,000 short stories for Black Library, featuring the Astra Militarum and the fighter aces of the Imperial Navy. He lives and works in Cambridge, UK, and is a huge Space Wolves fan

author.literal: Black Library, the Black Library logo

note: A CIP record for this book is available from the British Library.
